column1: "こんにちは and welcome to yuyo learning world :) _ [you can click text to skip]"
column2: "this is the best website for learning Japanese with its frendly design"
column4: yuyo (有用) which actually translates to helpful or useful"
column5: "here in Yuyo Learning World you can go through all the nesessary lessons for learning Japanese including N-level lessons from JPLT"
column6: "and whilst you have some downtime between lessons you can play against me in a traditional Japanese Game of Koi-Koi"
column7: "or you can listen to one of my fravorite Japanese jazz albums which i think you will really like"
column8: "Thank you for choosing me to help you learn Japanese and I hope you have a fun time in Yuyo Learning World"
column9: "when you're ready you can head back to the subjects by pressing the text on the left"
